      • getDaoFactory

        public static DaoFactory getDaoFactory​(DaoFactory.PersistenceType type)
                                throws DaoException
        Create a new factory.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of persistance to use.
        Returns:
        A new factory of the persistance type chosen.
        Throws:
        DaoException - When using an invalid type.
